text: Place which never disappoints you. Fantastic, authentic Indian food in Charlotte area at reasonable cost. Highly recommendable.

The biryani is extremely fragrant and flavorful. Enough spice to keep you on your toes but not overwhelming. Chicken is always tender and tasty as well.  Definitely worth trying as it will make you a repeat customer. :)
Balu's Biryani is the best in town. The flavors are amazing and the spice is just right!
